programme.desc: Tá an-spraoi ag Baby ag foghlaim faoi na hainmhithe éagsúla atá ar fheirm Dhaideo. (It's fun to learn about animals and the sounds that they make!)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Caithfidh ár gcairde droichead a dheisiú ach tá deacrachtaí acu an bhearna a thrasnú. (The crew need to repair a broken bridge across a canyon.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy

programme.title: Balloon Barnyard

programme.title: Dinocity

programme.title: Miraculous

programme.title: That's Joey
